inn1.comm: shortish ball outside off, pushed into the gap through cover, where Jayasuriya tidies up and you can't help but notice the big white plaster on his chin
on off, looks to turn it to the leg-side but checks the shot when he realises it's fuller than he expect
presses forward to defend outside off, the blade skewing a touch and the ball runs down to third man
squares him up outside off with a rising ball which crashes off the outside edge just by the splice and runs down to Malinga who slinga-s that one back in
watchful, Tendulkar leaves that one wide of off, he took one step forward and then shouldered arms
across the right hander, Vaas bowling over by the way, a touch of width outside off, worked to point off the front foot
good swing first up for Malinga, the ball gently arcing away as it pitches on a good length, and defended on the frotn foot, the bat slightly away from the pads
on off, a good length, but well worked with a whip of the wrists pressed off the back foot behind square
a good lick, 145.3kph, good length, good line, not much wrong with that one, swinging away, squaring him up on the back foot
on off, rises, defended back down off the back foot into the short cover region
swing away again, but enough width down off for the batsman to jump into the line and bunt it off the back foot with a drive to point
outside off, crashed into the covers off the back foot, picked up easily by the fielder and this one rounds off another good over
pushed across the right hander, who waits on the back foot and presses back down
slightly overpitched, Tendulkar was almost late on the shot but presses forward nothing more than a forward defence which pings off and rockets through point. Save your legs
on off, Tendulkar gets over the ball and looks to work the ball to short midwicket, where it's picked up immediately
huge shout for one which swings back and hits him dead straight but perhaps a touch high. Rudi Koertzen certainly thinks so
slight stray on to middle and leg, and the batsman creeps over the ball, tucking it to short midwicket off the front foot
swing back into him, and a push to the covers brings up a single despite a confusing call of "No!", a misfield allows the overthrow
on off and whipped into the midwicket region with something of a disco flick - a bit of a shimmy and a dazzle into the leg-side
on off, good length, worked into short midwicket and they look for the single
devious swing away outside off, good length, and the batsman moves over to push on the front foot
shuffled in on middle and leg, rising a touch, clipped with a bit of edge into short midwicket, the batsman shuffled down, and both shuffled through
on off stick this time, again a sliver high, dabbed down off the back foot
on middle and leg, a tad short, the batsman looks to brush the ball to square leg but doesn't quite get the room and ends up awkwardly squirting it into the leg-side
on middle and leg, the batsamn looks to work it into short midwicket

across him again, slower ball, swinging again, Tendulkar presses to the covers and Sehwag - not the fastest man ever - was backing up a long way. He got back in his crease without too many alarms despite Kapugedera's direct underarm but that may wake him up at least
lovely shot that one, Tendulkar out of his crease, meets the ball outside off, opening the face and finds the gap through cover
a huge appeal for a full one, which swung late and trapped him low, but also sounded like it took a woody click, not to mention it was missing leg too after nipping off the seam
comes outside off, more aggressive intent, looks to drive to cover but checks the shot
a fraction short on off and not for the first time today it's taken from the off-side and whipped through midwicket
on middle and leg, worked out on the front foot to Jayasuriya at square
smoothed in at 146.3 kph outside off, whirred on to the dime, and pushed forward by the batsman
on off and middle, Tendulkar again favours switching the ball to leg, whipping it through the 45
short outside off, worked easily through deep backward point
outside off, width, cut hard off the back foot down into the ground and up to the juggling Dilshan at gully, who collects and thinks of shying down
outside off, short, the batsman thinks of pulling but pulls out of the shot instead
late swing back into the batsman who leaves it nearly too late to chop down in front of off
on middle, not much room, but the batsman easily works off the hips to midwicket
outside off, played down off the back foot into the covers
played very late outside off, working down through to third man
outside off, a huge drive is belted to cover, quality fielding with a dive to the right
another edge, the batsman squaring up to that one and Muralitharan tries to tidy that one up with his feet on the boundary
outside off, left alone
that one was going over
good wheels from Malinga there, firing in outside off, some movement off the seam, the ball carrying through, skidding on like lightning off the pitch
the batsman didn't know too much about that one, waiting for he one outside off and chopping down off the back foot, with an inside edge that avoided the stumps
too wide from Malinga, allowing the batsman to cut hard off the back foot, Vaas racing round to tidy that up, stops it dead inside the rope and wings it back in. Excellent work
a low and quick bullet on middle and leg, taken well off the toes through the 45
down leg, but up there enough to make Tendulkar defend
on off and middle, played down off the back foot
angles down leg with a touch of swing too, played off the pads fine
played well off the legs in front of square
defended on the front foot
a hint of outswing as that's pushed to the covers
outside off, worked into the covers off the back foot
worked into the leg-side this time
outside off, cut to point
outside off, defended on the front foot
more defence
tight cricket here and defended on the back foot
superb delivery and the batsman knew it, he was beaten for pace outside off there, Tendulkar flashing late at it away from the body
defended well off the back foot
outside off, defended into the covers
short, outside off, worked into the covers off the back foot
outside off, cut well through point but it's also tidied up well too
outside off, pushed down to gully with a squeeze off the back foot, not much room for anything else with that ball
brilliant shot, came from nowhere really, not even that short on middle and Sehwag lifts that high and higher, pure timing, over long-on
on off, worked to short midwicket
up there on off, played forward
pushed past the right hander through to the keeper

ever so nearly out then, the ball on to him quicker than he expected and in trying to jump into a push off the hips he popped a leading edge up tantalisingly towards mid-on, it just seemed to hang there
played off the legs to short midwicket
turned off the legs to midwicket
pushed off the back foot into the covers
tucked off the legs through fine
outside off, a touch of width and short, Tendulkar waits and places down into the gap through point, the ball racing away through a slick outfield but it's picked up in time
banged down shot, a touch of movement away, left alone by the batsman
another short ball, straight, and played back down from under the ribs to very short midwicket
defended on the front foot
outside off, change of pace from Vaas, nipped away off the seam and the batsman follows it away from his body
an easy dab down in front of him from a good-length ball, a tap and go
short and wide down leg, wouldn't have been a wide in a Test
outside off and turned well off the legs through the 45 and they come back for two
outside off, cut hard to gully but put down by Dilshan who got two hands to it
left alone through
planted on a really good length, defended equally well on the front foot
outside off, good swing away, a direct hit from point and the batsmen had a bit of a mix-up there, which Tendulkar just smilles about
gone this time, Tendulkar goes to cover drive one outside off but drags it back firmly onto his stumps which crunch hard. Malinga immediately celebrates, putting out both arms and roaring
comes forward and defends on the front foot outside off
outside off and defended once more
outside off, pushed across him and defended down on the back foot
turned off the legs through midwicket, coming back for two, Sehwag tangled with Amerasinghe and was annoyed with the bowler as he felt he was being blocked. The umpire calmed him down
outside off, Gambhir shoulders arms to let that one across him
quick single to Muralitharan at mid-off who throws down the stumps but the batsman is well in, Gambhir is very quick
on leg, turned to midwicket this time
outside off, pushed across the left hander who crouches and cuts hard through gully
on middle and leg, tucked well off the hips now
up there on off, defended forward
down off, good length and so left alone
right up there on off, Gambhir makes the most of the half-volley, driving hard and straight down the ground. A rocket
outside off, pushed into point, straight to the man there
outside off, short, and pulled hard through midwicket, well controlled down and swivelled through
outside off, driven back to the bowler who picks it up easily
short ball down leg and Sri Lanka strike again, Sehwag swivelling round a pull and pushing the ball into Sangakkara's hands, the keeper diving well low to his left to take a two-handed catch
outside off, defends well on the front foot
outside off, squaring into the ball, a touch awkwardly, defended back down
outside off, rocked on to his back foot and steered down through gully
right up there on off, dug out back towards the bowler
right up there on middle, keeping the defending batsman quiet
pushed the batsman onto the back foot, waiting for the short ball to come on to the bat outside off, played down into the covers
outside off, defended on the front foot this time
neat ball, swinging back in on a good length to the left hander who waits and defends on the front foot
in the air, but safe. The ballc moing outside off, turning out off the seam, the batsman popping up a leading edge towards mid-on which just failed to carry
great stop from Jayasuriya in the covers after Vaas sent one in wide outside off, but his throw was off target
on leg, turned off the hips to short midwicket
dropped, Sangakkara fluffs that one, the bowler beating the batsman outside off, as he pressed an edge through off a forward defensive. Sangakkara goes left and drops it one-handed
surprised him again with one closer in this time, Sangakkara taking the ball easily this time
pushed forward into the off side this time
comes forward and defends on the front foot
whipped through at 140.3 kph, some good judgement from the batsman who leaves it on a good length just outside off
outside off, drives hard to Murali at mid-off who picks up the ball easily enough
good start, fizzing across the left hander on a good length, turning across him
half a chance from a nudge into the off-side, Sangakkara struggling to take a mis-throw back in to him
Murali gets the breakthrough! Flighted up beautifully, Yuvraj tempted to flash hard outside off but only connects through the edge which comes hard to Jayawardene at first slip who makes no mistake
right up there on off, the batsman comes forward to deliberately defend down, right over the ball

another excellent delivery from Murali, tempting the batsman forward and he plays down the wrong line as the ball bounces away from him, taking an edge. Sangakkara pouches and is almost celebrating before the decision comes. No third umpire is called for and he's on his way, but could be in trouble later as he stood there for a while, unhappy with the call
outside off, driven to the covers
shoulders arms to this one which goes through harmlessly on off
outside off, defended down off the back foot
left alone this time
left alone again this time
defended this time
more defence to round off a tidy maiden (if there's any other type)
lets that one crash into the legs
outside off, well bowled again and the batsman defends this time
outside off once more, pushed straight forward
flatter ball, spins back from outside off, defended on the front foot
outside off, played well off the back foot to the covers
keeps low outside leg, turns back in and is pushed back out to square
on off, pushed into the covers
outside off, a touch of width, cut hard off the back foot through the covers
good change of pace, a slower one looping in on the legs, and defended on the front foot
leans out to drive through mid-off for a quick single
nips back in to the batsman, straightening on middle, and the third leading edge of the innings squirts back towards the bowler
outside off, cut hard off the back foot to point
good flight outside off, the ball bending back in from outside off
oh, a direct hit from Kapugedera at gully would have had the non-striker then
great flight again, defended on the front foot
up on the legs, the batsman crouches and swivels a sweep through to square
on off, turning on to leg on a good length, worked round off the legs behind square
pushed across the left hander who watches it go on its merry way through
right up there and pushed to the cover
outside off, a full delivery, pushed forward on the front foot
good lift off the pitch on off, pushed down off the back foot and they shuffle through
Dhoni, who's batting in a cap by the way, tucks a full one off his hips through to the 45
outside off, beats the bat, the ball through before the would-be cut was played. The batsman then rehearses the shot
outside off, enough room to wait and caress the ball to gully off the back foot
well up there with the customary good flight, Dhoni strides well down the crease and defends forward
right up there again, looks at playing into short midwicket
presses forward again, looking to sweep round behind square, and indeed does
huge appeal for lbw, pitching on middle and leg, straightening, but a good stride foward could have saved him
driven out straight this time and returned well with an underarm flick
down the track and looks to send one aerial over midwicket, but mistimes the ball just over the ring. It lands safe
pushed right back on to the back foot and a push out to the covers brings up 100 which is roundly cheered by the Indian contingent
on off, rising, and Dhoni plays it back down with a push through mid-on
good length on off this time, driven back out
pushes him on to the back foot and he runs one down to gully where it's cut off with the right arm on the slide
outside off, driven hard through the covers
outside off, cracked hard off the back foot to the covers where it's well saved
up there on off, Dhoni opts to defend this time
the doosra, but down the wrong line and Dhoni puts it away well with a swish of a sweep through fine
very wide outside off, the ball ripping back and the batsman padding up
comes forward and tucks off the legs through midwicket
nips from outside leg on to middle, the batsman forward and drives quietly
outside off, good length, moves back to look to cut the ball, but plays it straighter in the end
across the left hander, plenty of room to cut through point, but it's tidied up easily
worked outside off and pushed back forward
outside off, cut hard to point
a booming wide down off, the bowler just trying too hard
cut back in from outside off, cut back down
on leg, turned back well off the legs
down leg, driven hard through mid-on and that one travels
pitched on off, pushed to mid-on for no run
pitched on leg, played back to short point
outside leg, worked back to leg for single
right up there on off, defended
pushed into the off-side
comes forward and drives to mid-on
right up there on off, and pushed into the off-side
on leg, pushed in front of short midwicket for a single
outside off, pushed on the front foot
outside off again, a touch of rise, waited and pushed back to the mid-on region
good length at 108.4kph, dug out on the front foot
comes forward on the front foot and drives to mid-on
drags it a touch short, and the width allows the batsman plenty of time to cut through point
outside off again, cut down later this time, to the man at gully
room outside off, cut down behind point, using the pace of the delivery
down leg and you've got to love Dhoni's improvisation, swatting it down straight through the fine, almost like a tennis shot when the ball has gone over the head
comes outside off and defended on the front foot
outside off, a touch wide, driven through the covers
the ball ducks in from outside off with plenty of curve, slightly overpitched, and driven back straight to mid-off
dragged a touch short but cramped him for width by planting on off, swatted into the leg-side
cut in the air but wide of Jayawardene at cover
curl on to leg stump, pushed into the leg side this time
good line on off, Dhoni goes to hit on the up straight but checks the shot as he realises he's not quite under it enough
plenty of room outside off, driven out towards mid-on
outside off, played back into the ground
bent back in from outside off and driven on the front foot without much power
down the track and checks the drive into the on-side
down the track and the non-striker nearly chops on at his end with his bat, but the ball hadn't connected with fingers anyway
dipping ball on leg, swept off the ankles to square
outside off, launches his shoulders into a pounding cut through backward point
outside off, crouches into a cut behind point
outside off on a decent length, cut into the covers this time
outside off, wide enough to play late again
outside off, cut again into the covers
outside off, pushed through with a hint of wobble, the batsman lets it go down the channel
advances down the track to meet a good-length delivery and checks the drive to mid-off
comes forward and defends
comes out and drives to mid-off
well stroked over mid-on, coming down the track and lofting the shot, but Malinga slides well inside the rope
driven out through a wide mid-off and picked up well
on off, the batsman rocks back, exposes his stumps, but cuts hard through point
on leg and tucked off the hips behind square
on leg, turned off the thigh to deep square
well bowled by Amerasinghe, who's got a nice smooth run-up, and defended back straight on the front foot
on off, tried to whip it over to mid-on but misses out on the hit
comes forward and defends on the front foot
on leg, waited, and turned off the hips through the 45
good loop there, pitching on towards leg, the ball turned off the toes for a jogged single
pushed across the left hander who pushes forward on the front foot towards cover
drags it a touch short, the batsman down the track, and opening up to make room to drive hard wide of mid-on
pitched outside leg, driven forward
pitched outside leg once again, and turned round fine off the legs, Jayawardene fielding well inside the ring
comes forward and presses forward on the off-side
tidy ball, just outside off, played forward on the front foot
on off, driven straight back towards mid-off
on off, turned round well off the back foot but doesn't quite time it properly as it's swivel-punched to midwicket
wide outside off, cut hard on the up, but very safely, through the vacant gully region
on middle, good length, turned to short midwicket and there's a well-judged single, Dhoni would have been in even the hit had been direct
outside off, but not as much room as he thought there was, tucked up as he tried to cut it and a top edge runs to fine third man
looks to cut to the covers, but hasn't quite got the width to connect fully
good confidence from Gambhir, easing the ball over extra cover to bring up his fifty in some style
good flight on that one, pitching down leg, tucked well through midwicket as he reached down the track to connect and they come back for a handy two
pitching on middle and leg and straightening, Gambhir missing out on the pull through midwicket
...but he got hold of it this time, rocking back with plenty of room to fire that strongly through square with power and timing
on leg, looks to turn it into the on-side
one of his typical late-innings yorkers, right up there on middle, defended forward
a half-volley this time and Gambhir connects so well with a lofted drive that clears long-off with plenty of room to spare
defended this time
very wide down off
outside off and driven hard through the covers
short ball, hooked down off the eyes through midwicket
squirted wide to steal the strike
on the front foot, defended this time
wide, a big whoosh, but a safe one, through gully
down leg, Dhoni goes for the straight sweep but it's called wide
attempts the straight sweep again, picks out fine leg now
outside off, good length, cut hard in front of point
right up there, bat and pad meeting the ball outside off, driven through cover
down leg, turned fine and they run through another single
full outside off and driven out through long-off
outside off, driven hard through point
low full toss outside leg, stabbed down hard behind square
some good entertainment here, Gambhir smashes a half-volley hard over long-on, who gets a hand on it, and that brings up the 200
driven out to mid-off
full and driven hard to long-off for a strike-stealing single and the chance to bring up the 50 next ball... or at least soon
Dhoni at his best! Brings up the fifty in quality style, with a huge stand-and-deliver six over long-on, played on the up and up, throwing all his weight behind that
up there and driven hard through mid-on
right up there now, quietening him up and he digs out defensively
low full toss, reverse swept magnificently through square and again that's gone like a tracer
comes down but defends in the end
right up there, looks to turn off the pads on leg, checks the shot, though
up there on leg, swept through midwicket
on off, driven hard through long-off and that's well stopped with the ankle
right up there on leg, turned into short midwicket
low full toss, driven out to mid-on
turned down leg, and played off the toes to fine leg
turned off the legs again through fine
on leg, tried to turn into the leg-side
on the front foot, defended forward
outside off, played to point
straight, a touch short, the batsman moves back to make room and drive over cover
straight and again he gives himself room, this time late cutting through third man, a neat dab for four
on leg, turned down through fine
short and pulled out, nearly holing out at deep midwicket but bounced just in front of Kapugedera
short, backed away and smashed through short midwicket
yorker outside leg and that's so well pinpointed, Dhoni hardly blinking as he whipped it away off his legs for another super shot
outside leg again, another flick again
outside off, the batsman rocking back, too far as it happened because he was nowhere near the would-be launch over long off, his head well away from the ball
outside off, very full, cut low to point
slower ball first up, full too, and dug out straight through mid-off
outside off, not too much wrong with the width, and driven out to mid-off easily
outside off, deceived Dhoni who tried to sweep from outside off
outside off again and Dhoni picks that one up well, driving over long-on for a one-bounce four, no sign of the discomfort there
low full toss, boomed out to long-off where Dilshan travels 15 or so metres to cut it off
outside off, goes across the line with a big sweep to keep the strike
good yorker, straight, but driven out to mid-on
outside off, not a terrible length, rocks back and drives well, wide of mid-off, to inch closer to the hundred
outside off and pulled hard through midwicket for a great century off 99 balls, with ten fours and a six
driven high on the off-side, over cover
outside off, across his stumps and plays somehow into the off-side
outside off, driven hard off the back foot - literally, his front foot was high in the air - and they come back for two
